text: He da'uda! Amhi tumhala dharativara khalipha banavile, tevha tumhi lokancya daramyana n'yayasaha phaisala kara ani apalya manacya iccha akanksance anusarana karu naka, an'yatha ti tumhala allahacya margapasuna hatavila. Nihsansaya, je loka allahacya margapasuna bhatakatata, tyancyasathi sakta azaba (siksa-yatana) ahe. Asasathi ki tyanni hisobacya divasaca visara padala ahe
